subject: Baseball
Basketball
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Tony La Russa, the National League manager in this year’s All-Star game, is likely to be criticized whether he chooses Matt Cain or R.A. Dickey to be his starting pitcher.
snippet: Tony La Russa, the National League manager in this year’s All-Star game, is likely to be criticized whether he chooses Matt Cain or R.A. Dickey to be his starting pitcher.
